name: unity-agentic-tools-claude-plugin
description: Claude Code plugin for Unity YAML file tools

scripts.validate: jq empty .claude-plugin/plugin.json && jq empty .claude-plugin/marketplace.json && jq empty hooks/hooks.json && echo 'All JSON valid'
scripts.check-hooks: node -e "const h=require('./hooks/hooks.json');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');let ok=true;for(const[,matchers]of Object.entries(h.hooks)){for(const m of matchers){for(const hook of m.hooks){const cmd=hook.command;const script=cmd.replace(/.*hooks\//,'hooks/');if(!fs.existsSync(script)){console.error('Missing:',script);ok=false;}}}}if(ok)console.log('All hook scripts exist');else process.exit(1);"
